Smart Cookie Jar: A high-tech cookie jar that can track the number of cookies consumed and provide real-time nutritional information. The jar can also detect when a cookie is approaching its expiration date and alert the user. Confidence Score: 0.8

Personalized Cookie Recommendations: A smart cookie jar that uses machine learning algorithms to analyze the user's cookie preferences and suggest personalized recommendations based on their taste profile. The jar can also provide recipes and suggestions for pairing cookies with different beverages. Confidence Score: 0.9

Cookie Jar with Built-In Cooling System: A cookie jar with a built-in cooling system that keeps the cookies fresh for a longer period. The cooling system can be powered by a small battery or solar panel, making it a convenient and eco-friendly option. Confidence Score: 0.7

Interactive Cookie Jar: A cookie jar that responds to voice commands, allowing users to control the temperature, lighting, and even the music playing in the room. The jar can also play games and provide fun facts about cookies. Confidence Score: 0.6

Smart Cookie Jar with Augmented Reality: A cookie jar that uses augmented reality technology to provide an immersive cookie-eating experience. The jar can display a virtual cookie landscape, complete with animated characters and interactive games. Confidence Score: 0.8
